borrower_name: Describe the name of the organisation from the document, give only the name
type_of_business: Describe the type of business of the organisation in the document, precisely
industry_analysis: Give a brief descrition of the industry segment in which this company operates in, within 100 words
business_analysis: What are the revenue streams of the company with emphasis on critical revenue? in 2 lines, Which customer segment it is Company targeting and how effective it is ? in 2 lines, What are the Key activities company performs to maintain profitability and sales? in 2 lines
management_analysis: Classify the company on the basis of Size, Ownership and the type of ownership in few lines, Stake Holder's analysis for the company in few lines, Who is the CEO, Managing director, COO, CIO of the company
